org.eclipse.january.metadata

Interface IExtendedMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, IDataAnalysisObject, IMetadata, MetadataType, Serializable

    public interface IExtendedMetadata
extends IMetadata
    This is an interface that has been designed to add information about a file in addition to information which has been implemented in IMetadata.

    It is intended that implementations of this interface will be through an adapter

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.eclipse.january.metadata.IMetadata

      • getCreation

        Date getCreation()
        This should be the timestamp of when the experiment or measurement took place which should be recorded in the header of the file, if applicable
        Returns:
        a date object to represent when the data was created

      • getLastModified

        Date getLastModified()
        Returns:
        a date object that indicated when the data was last modified

      • getCreator

        String getCreator()
        Returns:
        a string representing the user who created the file

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Returns:
        a string containing the filename

      • getFileOwner

        String getFileOwner()
        Returns:
        the owner of the file

      • getFileSize

        long getFileSize()
        Returns:
        a long representing the size of the file in bytes

      • getFullPath

        String getFullPath()
        Returns:
        the full path string of the file

      • getScanCommand

        String getScanCommand()
        Returns:
        The scan command as a string that was used to generate the data. This can be null as not always applicable
